title: Director, Growth and Analytics
summary: At Roll20, I report to the CEO as part of our executive team. I also lead our marketing team of six, manage two agencies, and own growth-driven product initiatives, all while running A/B tests and analytics as an IC.
duties: I manage ten marketing channels responsible for acquiring new daily active users (DAU), improving subscriber retention, and increasing ARPU across our subscription and marketplace products.

Led a retention-focused workstream including pricing experimentation, re-evaluating subscription features, and an entirely new cancellation flow, adding $300k+ in incremental ARR via reduced churn and increased LTV.
